tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_objects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_name VARCHAR(255),
    object_type VARCHAR(50),
    object_size FLOAT,
    object_color VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ObjectShapes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  object_id INT,
  shape_type VARCHAR(50),
  vertices JSON,
  FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES VirtualObjects(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ObjectMaterials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  object_id INT,
  material_name VARCHAR(50),
  texture_image VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES VirtualObjects(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ObjectLocations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  object_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  longitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  altitude DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES VirtualObjects(id)
);
